meanings.definition: People who have assets worth multiple billions of dollars.
meanings.sent1: Many multibillionaires donate to charity to help others.
meanings.sent2: The multibillionaires in the tech industry are often well-known.
meanings.sent3: The multibillionaires decided to have a race to see who could give away the most money.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, multibillionaires are like kings ruling over their empires.
meanings.sent5: The image of multibillionaires flying in private jets is a symbol of extreme wealth.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who possess a combined net worth in the billions.
meanings.sent1: The multibillionaires gathered for a meeting to discuss their investments.
meanings.sent2: It is impressive how multibillionaires manage their vast wealth.
meanings.sent3: The multibillionaires threw a lavish party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: The impact of multibillionaires on the economy is significant.
meanings.sent5: Seeing multibillionaires in luxury yachts showcases their prosperity.

meanings.definition: The wealthiest individuals in the world, with assets exceeding several billion dollars.
meanings.sent1: Media often covers the extravagant lifestyles of multibillionaires.
meanings.sent2: Multibillionaires invest in various industries to diversify their wealth.
meanings.sent3: During the charity auction, the multibillionaires bid competitively.
meanings.sent4: The influence of multibillionaires extends beyond financial realms.
meanings.sent5: The success stories of multibillionaires inspire many aspiring entrepreneurs.
